original_title: ไฟนรกขุมโลกันต์
overview: Pleng had to flee the Logan village after he was severely assaulted. Many year has passed, he comes back to this place which is ruled by gangster. After godfather finds that he comes back and hiding information about precious things, so another hunt begins.
tagline: Not hot, not fire…not cruel, not hell.
title: Logan, Hell Fire
